ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Newbie on list - finally found a Bard list with some lfe to it!
ygData.msgSnippet: BTW - Joyjoy got a Melodic BP - on a raid that continued after I left .  I m not sure how often Icewell is camped - I fought there once and there was a
ygData.messageBody:
BTW - Joyjoy got a Melodic BP - on a raid that continued after I left
<sigh>. I'm not sure how often Icewell is camped - I fought there once and
there was a warrior waiting to loot armor - I'm sure if you can find a group
camping and they don't need the armor they'll let you loot it.

Note that before a couple of patches ago - this wasn't bard usable..

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: John Grady [mailto:john_grady@...]
Sent: Friday, April 06, 2001 3:15 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Newbie on list - finally found a Bard list with
some lfe to it!


Really cool, but sorry about your luck Slyde. I've been in the Warlord all
of two times and the hand was camped seperately, but at peak hours with
60+ peeps in the zone.

Hey, hope to meet up on one of the XA raids. And thanks for the advice.
Prob need to get back to SS where I won the roll on my Sentry BP.

As for Icewell, I'm already KOS in SS and Kael. Think there's any
possibility of looting a Bard only No Drop in Icewell without killing and
taking the faction hit? I'm no familiar with the zone (i.e. getting out)
or the drops.

The only Bard I've seen so far with the Melodic BP got it in a free loot
from a group in POG with no Bard. Talk about being in the right place at
the right time!

Tzeetch
Ministel on Xegony
